TopicTitle: KSP Crashing Right Before Main Menu

Articles.Content: As soon as it tries to load the main menu  it crashes, here is the crash section of the output_log: https://pastebin.com/e0gy9rcY. Please help!

Did you install the correct version of DiscordRP? Looks like you run an older version of KSP, something between 1.2 and 1.3.1

Delete the installed mod, use the game filter option of this curse page to get the correct mod version and install it.

If it doesn't help, a full log would be helpful

1 minute ago, 4x4cheesecake said:

Did you install the correct version of DiscordRP? Looks like you run an older version of KSP, something between 1.2 and 1.3.1

Delete the installed mod, use the game filter option of this curse page to get the correct mod version and install it.

If it doesn't help, a full log would be helpful

I did see DiscordRP in there but im bad at reading code. This happened after I installed a group of mods I guess DiscordRP conflicted with something because Ive had it for a while so I'll just delete it and see what happens

9 minutes ago, GamerBoy7474 said:

I did see DiscordRP in there but im bad at reading code. This happened after I installed a group of mods I guess DiscordRP conflicted with something because Ive had it for a while so I'll just delete it and see what happens

It is the only mod mentioned in the crash part of the log so maybe it is related

I'm not really good in reading the logs as well, but a full log provides informations about all installed mods (incl. the version), game version and proably some other error messages which might help to isolate the issue.
DiscordRP is not the mod, i'm pretty sure it has to do with monoprop.

3 hours ago, GamerBoy7474 said:

DiscordRP is not the mod, i'm pretty sure it has to do with monoprop.

mono (the software) can be a problem, yes. Usually, if the mono.dll causes a crash, the reason are outdated mods. Like I said in my first reply, a full log would be helpful

Phew, what a mess

I found a few things that might help you to fix your game:

1) You run several versions of MM, some for older version of KSP and even one for a new version of KSP. Since you got several exceptions regarding MM, I would suggest to remove all copies except for 3.0.4 (the latest release for KSP 1.3.1, create a backup or just move other versions out of the GameData directory)

2) A few mods are not compatible

  • SCANSat must be v. 18.4 https://github.com/S-C-A-N/SCANsat/releases/tag/v18.4
  • StationScience must be v. 2.3.0 https://github.com/tomforwood/StationScience/releases/tag/v2.3.0
  • Romfarer latest release is compatible with KSP 0.90...if it is an dependency for another mod, try to keep it but it creates several errors. Otherwise: uninstall.
  • North Kerbin Dynamics requires BDA 1.1 BETA (looks like you git 1.0) take a look at the thread of North Kerbin Dynamics and BDA (linked in the OP of NKD)
  • Infernal Robotics part 'IR Surface Sampler' seems bugged. Since I cannot find any other issues with the mod, try to keep it, maybe just remove the part.
  • Textures Unlimited: several errors but I cannot see the installed version number. Reinstall it and be sure to grab the correct version
  • Comfortable Landing: Same as Textures Unlimited
  • FelineUtilityRovers: You missed to install 000_KerbetrotterTools which is bundled with this mod. Also the .dll doesn't load, so be sure to grab the correct version: https://github.com/Nils277/FelineUtilityRovers/releases/tag/1.1.1

Guess that's all for now and I hope this will help you
